session.editor.card.title: Session
session.editor.helper.login:
Sign in with an email and password to simulate a user.
Use this to see which data is loaded for different users.
session.editor.helper.schema: Define the data that is created for every new user when they register. These default values are used to initialize your user profile in Firebase.
